name: Room 307
description:
It's a P.T.-inspired short horror game. It's a walking simulator. You are just a random person going to a friend's house. However, you were unfortunate enough to have halutination due to some pills you take, but is it really the pills' fault?

Warning

Epileptic warning for flashing lights

 18+ mature content (blood, etc.) 

 This game might cause Nightmares              

Controls

WASD to move

Mouse to look

Features

Scary environment

PS1 retro effect

A story

----------------------------------------------

If you have any questions about the game or the instructions, feel free to leave a comment. 

Music by Withxr -> https://www.youtube.com/@withxr6412
